To access the Monzo api via this app you need to setup an OAuth client. Go to Monzo Developer Portal , setup a new OAuth client and then input the following details below (you will need to set your redirect uri to the url below). You will also need to set the auth to public so you can get a refresh access token. Once the details have been input select login and it will redirect you to the monzo developer login again. This will trigger another email, you should open the link in the email on your phone and select to open in this app, this will complete the setup.
